ingredients: 4 medium Russet potatoes, cut into ½-inch dice
1 cup frozen petite peas (the smallest you can find)
1 inch by ½ inch knob of turmeric, peeled grated or ½ teaspoon dried
1 inch by ½ inch knob of ginger, peeled and grated or ½ teaspoon dried
1 minced Thai bird chili, seeded, ribs removed, minced finely, optional
¼ teaspoon ground toasted cardamom, optional
